summary: THE  WINDSHIELD WIPERS HAVE PERIODICALLY STOPPED WORKING UNEXPECTEDLY, CAUSING A COMPLETE LOSS OF VISION IN RAIN AND SALT SPRAY.  THEY MOVE AN INCH AND THEN STOP.  SOMETIMES THEY CAN BE RESTARTED RIGHT AWAY, SOMETIMES NOT.   OCCASIONALLY WIPERS STOP IN FRONT OF DRIVER'S VISION.   THIS IS A SERIOUS SAFETY ISSUE.  99 DODGE INTREPID.  DEALER "COULD NOT REPRODUCE" PROBLEM.
